# nCov2019_analysis

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of nCov2019_analysis is to visualize the infection in Shanghai and Guizhou province using Python and R.

I borrow from the data downloading from @Isaac_Lin2020 and data manipulation from @Xu2020.

## How to use

```bash
make all
```

## Dependency

1. Python 3.7.3
1. R 3.6.0
1. 1.2.5033
